basic.description: The methodology of literary analysis. Assignments may include textual analysis, translation and composition.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Analyse Textuelle et étude de la langue

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of C in FREN110 or a grade of B in (FREN100 or [FREN101 and FREN102]).
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from FREN220; FREN221.
